com.thegongoliers.input.operator

Class JoystickTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thegongoliers.input.operator.JoystickTransformer

  • public class JoystickTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double deadzone(double input, double thresh)
      Blocks movement within a threshold on an axis.
      static double power(double input, double pow)
      Smoothes the value of the joystick by a power.
      static double[] radialDeadzone(double x, double y, double thresh)
      Blocks movement with a radius of (0, 0)
      static double scaledDeadzone(double input, double thresh)
      Blocks movement within a threshold on an axis, but scales the output to be in [-1, 1]
      static double[] scaledRadialDeadzone(double x, double y, double thresh)
      Blocks movement with a radius of (0, 0) and scales the resulting good zones from 0 to +/- 1

      Changes the sensitivity of the joystick value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JoystickTransformer

        public JoystickTransformer()

    • Method Detail

      • sensitivity

        public static double sensitivity(double input,
                                 double sensitivity)
        Changes the sensitivity of the joystick value. Call after applying other adjustments to the joystick value.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        sensitivity - The sensitivity (greater than 0, where 0 is no movement)
        Returns:
        The adjusted controller input with the sensitivity applied.

      • power

        public static double power(double input,
                           double pow)
        Smoothes the value of the joystick by a power. Should be applied after a deadzone transformation.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        pow - The smoothing power.
        Returns:
        The smoothed joystick value.

      • deadzone

        public static double deadzone(double input,
                              double thresh)
        Blocks movement within a threshold on an axis.
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        thresh - The deadzone threshold.
        Returns:
        The adjusted joystick value with the deadzone.

      • scaledDeadzone

        public static double scaledDeadzone(double input,
                                    double thresh)
        Blocks movement within a threshold on an axis, but scales the output to be in [-1, 1]
        Parameters:
        input - The value of the joystick.
        thresh - The deadzone threshold.
        Returns:
        The adjusted joystick value with the deadzone.

      • radialDeadzone

        public static double[] radialDeadzone(double x,
                                      double y,
                                      double thresh)
        Blocks movement with a radius of (0, 0)
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of the joystick.
        y - The y value of the joystick.
        thresh - The deadzone threshold.
        Returns:
        The adjusted joystick value with the deadzone where x is at position 0 and y is at position 1.

      • scaledRadialDeadzone

        public static double[] scaledRadialDeadzone(double x,
                                            double y,
                                            double thresh)
        Blocks movement with a radius of (0, 0) and scales the resulting good zones from 0 to +/- 1
        Parameters:
        x - The x value of the joystick.
        y - The y value of the joystick.
        thresh - The deadzone threshold.
        Returns:
        The adjusted joystick value with the scaled deadzone where x is at position 0 and y is at position 1.
